FAQ_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Everything you need to know about our sprite marketplace
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_1: A sprite marketplace is an online platform where artists can sell and buyers can purchase digital sprite assets for use in games, websites, and other digital projects.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_2: How do I upload my sprites for sale?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_2: Simply create an account, go to your dashboard, and use our easy upload tool to add your sprite creations. Don't forget to set your price and add relevant tags!
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_3: We support popular sprite formats including PNG, GIF, and sprite sheets. Each listing can include multiple file types to suit different buyer needs.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_4: How do royalties work for sprite creators?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_4: Creators earn 80% of each sale. Payments are processed weekly, and you can track your earnings in real-time through your dashboard.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_5: Can I use purchased sprites in commercial projects?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_5: Yes! Unless otherwise stated in the sprite's listing, all purchases come with a standard commercial license. Always check the specific license details before use.
PLACEHOLDER_FAQ_TITLE: Frequently Asked Questions About Our Sprite Marketplace
ACCORDION_QUESTION_1: What types of sprites can I find on this marketplace?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_1: Our marketplace offers a wide variety of sprites, including characters, objects, backgrounds, and animations for game development, web design, and digital art projects.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_2: How do I sell my own sprite creations on the platform?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_2: To sell your sprites, simply create an account, upload your artwork, set your prices, and provide relevant details. Our team will review your submissions to ensure quality before they're listed.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_3: What are the licensing terms for purchased sprites?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_3: Licensing terms may vary depending on the artist. Generally, we offer standard licenses for personal and commercial use. Always check the specific license details provided with each sprite listing.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_4: Can I request custom sprite designs from artists?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_4: Yes! Many artists on our platform accept custom commissions. You can contact them directly through our messaging system to discuss your specific sprite design needs and requirements.
